entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump I hate to interrupt your temper tantrum but in case you haven’t noticed, thanks to your failed presidency the following things are happening, you are responsible:

* Americans dying from COVID-19 due to your negligence

* Americans unemployed because of your negligence

1 of many
